solution_line_template: Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is {num_fingers}-{trumpets_fewer}=<<{num_fingers}-{trumpets_fewer}={trumpets}>>{trumpets} trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is {guitars_more}+{num_hands}=<<{guitars_more}+{num_hands}={guitars}>>{guitars} guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is {trombones_more}+{num_heads}=<<{trombones_more}+{num_heads}={trombones}>>{trombones} trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is {guitars}-{french_horns_fewer}=<<{guitars}-{french_horns_fewer}={french_horns}>>{french_horns} French horns.
